title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the report.
2. Navigate to the parameter settings.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes.

Observed behavior: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Expected behavior: The modified default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The modified default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Navigate to the parameter settings.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes.
